first_para: Roger Hugh Williams, CBE, MP (born 22 January 1948) is a Liberal Democrat politician in the UK. He has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for the constituency of Brecon and Radnorshire since the 2001 general election.

full.extract: Roger Hugh Williams, CBE, MP (born 22 January 1948) is a Liberal Democrat politician in the UK. He has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for the constituency of Brecon and Radnorshire since the 2001 general election.
full.title: Roger Williams (British politician)
